speaker: Karl Funk
session: Non-stop transactions in the face of disaster
message: Live demonstration showing a Banking Application with a central database for ledger management. We will show how the central database can survive an Availability Zone or even a Region failure. We then extend the use case to include an Edge Computing use case.

speaker:
Dave Roberts
Doug Hadfield
session: Stopping the sky falling in? Building and operating clusters for resilience
message: A live demonstration of building (Day 1) and operating (Day 2) clusters in the cloud that are  designed for resilience and ease of operation

speaker:
Dai Clegg
David Walker
Alan Caldera
message: In this session we'll bring to the stage our key technical speakers of the day together with company senior management for a moderated Q &A session that will be driven by live questions from the audience.

speaker: Drinks & Food
session:
Beer & Pizza
Plug-in to our engineers, Play with the technology whilst you enjoy a drink and a snack
